trans-unit.source: Restore a deleted Azure SQL database with REST API
trans-unit.target: Restore a deleted Azure SQL database with REST API

trans-unit.target: [AZURE.SELECTOR]

trans-unit.target: Restore deleted database - portal

trans-unit.source: Restore deleted database - PowerShell
trans-unit.target: Restore deleted database - PowerShell

trans-unit.source: Overview
trans-unit.target: Overview

trans-unit.source: This guide shows you how to restore a deleted Azure SQL database with REST API.
trans-unit.target: This guide shows you how to restore a deleted Azure SQL database with REST API.

trans-unit.source: Links to more detailed operations are provided.
trans-unit.target: Links to more detailed operations are provided.

trans-unit.source: Restoring a deleted Azure SQL database creates a new database.
trans-unit.target: Restoring a deleted Azure SQL database creates a new database.

trans-unit.source: The service automatically selects the service tier based on the backup used at the restore point.
trans-unit.target: The service automatically selects the service tier based on the backup used at the restore point.

trans-unit.source: Make sure you have available quota on the logical server to create another database.
trans-unit.target: Make sure you have available quota on the logical server to create another database.

trans-unit.source: If you'd like to request an increased quota, contact [Azure Support](http://azure.microsoft.com/support/options/).
trans-unit.target: If you'd like to request an increased quota, contact [Azure Support](http://azure.microsoft.com/support/options/).

trans-unit.source: Restrictions and Security
trans-unit.target: Restrictions and Security

trans-unit.source: See [Restore a deleted Azure SQL database in the Azure portal](sql-database-restore-deleted-database-tutorial-management-portal.md).
trans-unit.target: See [Restore a deleted Azure SQL database in the Azure portal](sql-database-restore-deleted-database-tutorial-management-portal.md).

trans-unit.source: How to: Restore a deleted Azure SQL database using REST API
trans-unit.target: How to: Restore a deleted Azure SQL database using REST API

trans-unit.source: List all of your restorable deleted databases by using the [List Restorable Dropped Databases](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn509562.aspx) operation.
trans-unit.target: List all of your restorable deleted databases by using the [List Restorable Dropped Databases](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn509562.aspx) operation.

trans-unit.source: Get the details for the deleted database you want to restore by using the [Get Restorable Dropped Database](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn509574.aspx) operation.
trans-unit.target: Get the details for the deleted database you want to restore by using the [Get Restorable Dropped Database](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn509574.aspx) operation.

trans-unit.source: Begin your restore by using the [Create Database Restore Request](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn509571.aspx) operation.
trans-unit.target: Begin your restore by using the [Create Database Restore Request](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn509571.aspx) operation.

trans-unit.source: Track the status of your restore by using the [Database Operation Status](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn720371.aspx) operation.
trans-unit.target: Track the status of your restore by using the [Database Operation Status](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn720371.aspx) operation.
